sentences.en: Adoption can fail for all kinds of reasons.

sentences.en: Adoption papers were duly filed in May 1974.
sentences.cn: 有关收养的文件在1974年5月就已归档.

sentences.en: He was not born here, but this is now his country of adoption.
sentences.cn: 他虽然不生于此地, 但现在这里已是他的入籍国了.

sentences.en: It makes nonsense of our own rules governing laws of adoption in this country.
sentences.cn: 这使将我们自己的规定凌驾于该国收养法之上的做法显得十分荒谬。

sentences.en: She decided to put the baby up for adoption .

sentences.en: Since the adoption of the new working method, production has gone up.

sentences.en: Statistics on international adoption are not complete.

sentences.cn: 为了确认这种收养,必须举行入族典礼.

sentences.en: The word is now English by adoption.

sentences.en: This sensitive book tackles the delicate issue of adoption with care and simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这本敏感的书谨慎、简洁地讨论了收养这一微妙问题。

sentences.en: This was exercised through adoption into the family, but required public formalities and was exceptional.
